title: 2 polar bears Left for sale.. SOLD
author: Golfcollector

posts.post_title: 2 polar bears Left for sale.. SOLD
posts.post_content:
Up for grabs is the last 5 commons that I am offering at this time for sale.
Prices below include Priority Mail shipping to you.

Please PM me or claim below in remarks.

I will periodically lower pricing at my discretion if items remain unsold.

Thanks for looking!  Happy Collecting!


Tommy Leach - Polar Bear - Creasing primarily on left side - $40 sild

Lee Tannehill - Polar Bear  $40 sold

Bill Bradley - Polar Bear - nicest of the 3 PB cards $60  ** SOLD **

George Hunter Brooklyn Superbas - Piedmont 350  $60 *** Sold***

Buck Herzog - Boston - Piedmont 350-460   $55  *** Sold ***

some emails to me on the remaining cards.

Must contact me via PM on the site. 

Thanks

Dave
I’ve tried a few times, unsuccessfully, I guess.
I’ll take the last two PB cards.
